attributes.action: Stop work places having two tier sick pay for unvaccinated employees
attributes.additional_details: Any company that gives company sick pay to vaccinated employees should be made to give the same to unvaccinated employees to stop people from coming into work with a fear of losing money and risking others lives.
attributes.background: If an unvaccinated individual is isolating due to catching COVID and a vaccinated individual has to isolate for the same reason they should receive the same sick pay and not be discriminated against over vaccination status.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
